summary: Custom model of Witcher\'s Silver sword. Now in delicious 1 and 2 handed flavors.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]NEnthwcF1xo[/youtube] [youtube]3C2T_tl9Iiw[/youtube]
 [youtube]7A6icbKBOL0[/youtube]
Custom model of the Witcher\'s Silver sword from the Witcher RPG games. Made by myself for a competiton at another site :) It currently replaces the default silver sword in the game, although the nif\'s and dds files can be found inside the archive for anyone that wants to make unique objects etc :) Or just take the art and use it for something else.

**Kimono was kind enough to allow me to append my standalone version to this file**
Instead of replacing the vanilla silver sword, this mod  now adds two unique swords both 1 and 2 hand versions. They are not craftable, but you can improve them. The swords can be found near a throne in the first big room in Dustman\'s Cairn, so if you follow the Companion\'s quest line you\'ll be sure to see them.


Change Log
0.1 - Kimono\'s initial release
0.2 - standalone version by backstept
- created 2 hand versions
- fixed blood effects mesh
author: Kimono - Standalone by backstept
